Introduction
This topic contains information on the priority of payments for burial benefits, including
automatic payments to an eligible surviving spouse
priority of payments
proof of executorship or administrator
burial claims received from funeral homes
payment to a person who murders a Veteran
, and
paying burial benefits when service is unverified
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A  - General Information on Burial Benefits and Allowances
citation: Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
